Question & Options:
Who was the main character in *Son of Chucky* as a result of the events in *Bride of Chucky*?
Options:
A. Chucky
B. Son of Chucky
C. Glen or Glenda
D. Don Mancini

Which horror villains were mentioned to have become less scary as they became more familiar with audiences in the movie *Son of Chucky*?
Options:
A. Chucky
B. Son of Chucky
C. Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees, and Freddy Krueger
D. Don Mancini
Correct Answer: Michael Myers, Jason Voorhees, and Freddy Krueger
